page.title: 03AN ORDINARY DAY AT BUSHMILLS
page.content: Each morning I get up at eight o'clock. I wash, dress and go downstairs to have my breakfast. For breakfast I eat porridge, toast and tea. Then I brush my teeth and my hair. Daddy takes me to school by car. We arrive in Bushmills at a quarter to nine. I play for half an hour with my friends. In the morning we do Spellings, English and Mathematics. Our dinner time is at half past twelve. After we eat our dinner we go out to play. In the afternoon we do History or Geography and then we go to our Hobbies groups. School is over at three o'clock and I go home by bus.
